input: Batch multiple requests to fetch lock event specifications and update user status and notes.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContractLockRequestEventSpecifications?$select=EventCode,EventName HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

PATCH /BankCardContractLockRequests/343434 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"UserStatusCode": "2", "Note": "Status and note updated."}


--request-separator--
